slides.title: Compute Engine
slides.description: Provides scalable virtual machines running on Google infrastructure. It offers full control over operating systems and networking. Commonly used for flexible compute workloads.

slides.title: App Engine
slides.description: Platform-as-a-Service for building and hosting applications. It automatically manages scaling and infrastructure. Developers focus mainly on application logic.

slides.title: Cloud Functions
slides.description: Serverless compute service for event-driven workloads. It scales automatically and charges per execution. Ideal for lightweight microservices.

slides.title: Cloud Run
slides.description: Fully managed container execution platform. It runs stateless containers with automatic scaling. Used for modern cloud-native applications.

slides.title: GKE
slides.description: Managed Kubernetes service. It simplifies cluster deployment and operations. Commonly used for containerized workloads.

slides.title: VPC
slides.description: Global virtual private cloud networking service. It supports secure, private connectivity. Used for multi-region architectures.

slides.title: Cloud Load Balancing
slides.description: Fully managed, global load balancing service. It distributes traffic efficiently across regions. Improves availability and performance.

slides.title: Cloud DNS
slides.description: Scalable and reliable DNS service. It supports low-latency domain resolution. Integrated with Google Cloud infrastructure.

slides.title: Cloud CDN
slides.description: Content delivery network for fast global content delivery. It reduces latency and improves user experience. Often used for web and media applications.

slides.title: Cloud Storage
slides.description: Unified object storage service with multiple storage classes. It offers high durability and scalability. Used for backups, data lakes, and static content.

slides.title: Persistent Disk
slides.description: Block storage for virtual machines. It provides high performance and reliability. Commonly used for databases and application data.

slides.title: Filestore
slides.description: Managed file storage service for applications. It supports shared access using NFS. Used for stateful workloads.

slides.title: Cloud SQL
slides.description: Managed relational database service. It supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server. Handles backups, patching, and scaling.

slides.title: Cloud Spanner
slides.description: Globally distributed relational database. It provides strong consistency and horizontal scalability. Used for mission-critical systems.

slides.title: Firestore
slides.description: Scalable NoSQL document database. It supports real-time synchronization. Commonly used for mobile and web apps.

slides.title: Bigtable
slides.description: Wide-column NoSQL database for large-scale workloads. It delivers low-latency access at scale. Used for analytics and time-series data.

slides.title: BigQuery
slides.description: Serverless data warehouse for analytics. It enables fast SQL queries on massive datasets. Used for business intelligence and data analysis.

slides.title: Memorystore
slides.description: In-memory data store service for Redis and Memcached. It improves application performance through caching. Used for low-latency access.

slides.title: Pub Sub
slides.description: Asynchronous messaging service for event ingestion. It supports global scalability. Used for event-driven architectures.

slides.title: Dataflow
slides.description: Fully managed stream and batch data processing service. It supports Apache Beam pipelines. Used for real-time analytics.

slides.title: Dataproc
slides.description: Managed Apache Spark and Hadoop service. It simplifies big data processing. Used for legacy and batch analytics workloads.

slides.title: API Gateway
slides.description: Managed service for creating and securing APIs. It handles authentication and traffic control. Used to expose backend services.

slides.title: Endpoints
slides.description: API management and monitoring service. It provides logging and security. Used for REST API management.

slides.title: IAM
slides.description: Identity and access management service. It controls permissions for users and services. Used to secure Google Cloud resources.

slides.title: Secret Manager
slides.description: Secure storage for sensitive configuration data. It supports versioning and access control. Used for managing application secrets.

slides.title: KMS
slides.description: Managed encryption key service. It enables encryption at rest and in transit. Integrated with Google Cloud services.

slides.title: Cloud Monitoring
slides.description: Monitoring and observability service for resources and applications. It collects metrics and alerts. Used to maintain system reliability.

slides.title: Cloud Logging
slides.description: Centralized logging service for applications and infrastructure. It supports advanced querying. Used for troubleshooting and audits.

slides.title: Cloud Trace
slides.description: Distributed tracing service. It analyzes latency and performance bottlenecks. Used for microservice architectures.

slides.title: Deployment Manager
slides.description: Infrastructure as code service for GCP. It automates resource provisioning using templates. Used for repeatable deployments.

slides.title: Cloud Build
slides.description: Continuous integration and build service. It compiles, tests, and packages code. Used in CI/CD pipelines.

slides.title: Artifact Registry
slides.description: Managed repository for container images and packages. It secures and stores build artifacts. Used in DevOps workflows.

slides.title: Vertex AI
slides.description: Unified machine learning platform. It supports training, deployment, and MLOps. Used for scalable AI solutions.

slides.title: Vision AI
slides.description: Image analysis and computer vision service. It detects objects and text. Used for visual intelligence applications.

slides.title: Speech to Text
slides.description: Speech recognition service. It converts audio into text. Used for transcription and voice-enabled apps.

slides.title: Natural Language
slides.description: Text analysis and NLP service. It extracts entities and sentiment. Used for document and content analysis.
